body:
Finally! VTK-m v1.7.1 release is finally out :tada: :tada: :tada:

This bring exiting new critical bugfixes. Find the release notes at https://gitlab.kitware.com/vtk/vtk-m/-/blob/master/docs/changelog/1.7.1/release-notes.md

No new features added to this release

Let me know if we need to change anything else in the package

ViB
title: VTKm: introduce new release
